tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My father had chest pain amidst covid pandemic. Through Google reviews and from friends suggestion, we decided to meet Dr.Harikrishnan, cardiologist. We booked an appointment and had a consultation with him. His approach was friendly with us and he explained  the diagnosis procedure for cardiac problem in a layman's view. Before diagnosis, he recommended my father for blood test and covid test. Unfortunately, my father got positive for asymptomatic covid. Immediately we consulted him to know what can be done further. He was kind enough to reply us through whatsapp whenever we messaged him without time restrictions. He suggested to get advise from Apollo fever clinic. As per his advice, we consulted the clinic and underwent CT scan and they advised for home quarantine. Since it was asymptomatic, everything went smoothly. After 14 days of home isolation, my father became covid negative. With no further delay we contacted Dr.Harikrishnan. He suggested for immediate angiogram procedure in Apollo hospital, vanagaram.  My father was diagnosed with nearly 10 blocks in the coronary artery and the doctor suggested immediate surgery and refered a surgeon in the same hospital. The surgery was successful and my father's health recovered well. We are having regular check up with Dr. Harikrishnan.  Thanks a lot for his continuous support during our critical time.
reply_text: Great detailed review,  Many thanks For your lovely words and feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When I started visiting Dr. Harikrishnan I was a different person, always worried for my health condition. But the way Dr. Harikrishnan explained me about my health condition and way to look forward, half of my worries disappeared. I started believing in me, which was more than any medication. Dr. Harikrishnan spends enough time to his patients, listen their silly question and answers them politely and happily. He is always very co-operative, helpful, joyful and his such supportive quality helped me in building my self-confidence. He not only prescribes medication for us, but also encourage us to follow a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise.
Now I am more confident and in good health, active person and all credit goes to Dr. Harikrishnan.  I truly respect him for his passion toward his profession
I have visited him for my father & uncle. My father & uncle are also very much impressed with his treatment, diagnosis, medication & to the point treatment. 
I am very thankful to him for his treatment, motivation, guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Mom was diagnosed with SVT on 2018. But since it was an rare occasional one, we didn't opt for any surgery then. But once the frequency of occurence went up, We consulted Dr. Harikrishnan for treatment. Not to exaggerate but he was the most professional and patient friendly doctor I've ever met. He was patient enough to hear the issue and diagnose with precision and explain it to us in detail without panicking anyone. We were so impressed by his approach that my mom who had her apprehension to proceed with surgery all these days agreed to it immediately. Now my mom is absolutely fine and we are ever grateful to Dr. Harikrishnan for completely curing my Mom.
reply_text: Wow, what a feedback! much appreciated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The most understanding and encouraging doctor we‚Äôve consulted so far. Any doctor can provide a prescription but to also understand the patient‚Äôs needs and mentality and provide them moral support is something only an outstanding doctor can provide and Doctor Harikrishnan is one among those rare gem doctors. I would highly recommend Doctor Harikrishnan if you want to consult for any cardiac related issues. **** *** **** ****** *** ***** ***** ***** **** ****** ****** **** ** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ************ ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** ********* ** **** *****. I told him the same!
He is professional, calm, cheerful, so informative, connected the dots and provided me with a great feedback and explained the process so very well, I was able to understand my errors and corrective actions.

He take his time to make sure the patient understand the illness and the wellness connected to it.
Thank you dr.harikrishnan for being so cheerful and sincere! I am seriously happy to have had this consultation with you.
Will remember and practice those simple things you suggested to keep me active and healthy.
reply_text: Many thanks For your lovely feedback  very much appreciated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctors are the closest humans we associate with divinity. They literally SAVE LIVES!!! And when a doctor is warm and friendly, you forget your worries momentarily and are immediately made to feel at ease. Doctor Harikrishnan is one such divine doctor. I was worried about chest pains that I'd been feeling, he was sooooo attentive and his expertise spoke for itself. He didn't suggest unnecessary tests. Just to make sure everything was okay, he suggested only an Echo and a Treadmill Test. And as he'd said, the results were normal and he attributed the pains to gastric issues that had cropped up due to some strong medicines I'd taken previously. He made me feel instantly relieved and even put a smiley face on my prescription! I felt so happy I could cry! My mother was relieved as well. His reassurance has given me all the more strength to keep at my weight loss journey to live a healthier life! Thanks, Doc! I am forever grateful! :)
reply_text: Wow, what a feedback! I am humbled.

review: I had a very very very very very bad experience with this doctor. I consulted him for my father. I have booked an appointment and reached the hospital half an hour late. Hospital is located in koyambedu which is a heavy traffic area and our home is located in Avadi. After checking with receptionist regarding the doctors availability we were waiting for consultation suddenly this man came out of his room and called us and asked us regarding our appointment timing I told him we are coming from long and due to heavy traffic it got delayed he asked me to show the OLA cab booking timing just like a exam invigilator and he started shouting without considering the heart patient. We were very upset with his rude behavior.By reading google reviews I thought the doctor is very friendly that's why I have taken my father there.The only concern I have here is he may be very strict with the appointment timings but even if he left us unattended that will be more better option rather than shouting us in front of everyone. I have ever seen a doctor like him. * **** *** **** *** *** **** * *** **** *** *** *********Totally disappointed. Never ever recommend this doctor for anyone.

reply_text:
Patient called me from inside ICU of a COVID ward where his dad was admitted, He was trying to ask me what needed to be done without giving me much information for fast heart beat of his dad. I spoke to him for enough time and tried to get as much information as possible. 
He sent me first a pic of the ventilation settings, I responded via practo app to request him to send the right readings. Next he sent me a snap shot of vitals and they were satisfactory and again I reassured that they were normal. 
I though enough time was spent to clarify his queries depending on the information given.
I even asked him if I could speak to any doctors in the ICU ward which he could not help.
 Moreover he was telling that the doctors there do not know anything and hence he was seeking my opinion. 
It is very difficult to guide treatment of critically ill people without getting proper info via online apps and I feel that he expected too much from the consultation.
